content: WWNeuRise wants to give Neuroscience PhD students and PostDocs an opportunity to present their work to a wide expert audience, thus providing first-hand research results. The talks will take place every other week on Wednesdays at 5 pm (CET), featuring 2 presentations of 30 minutes, followed by a “meet the speaker” session. Talks will be streamed on Crowdcast.
